value.title: DAX Fridays! #168: COALESCE function a.k.a koala function ;)
value.excerpt: In todays video I will review the COALESCE function a.k.a koala function and show you some cases where this function is useful.  I also answer Question 2 of the Microsoft Power BI exam  and ask question 3. Happy Friday!  Link to sqlserver tutorial: https://www.sqlservertutorial.net/sql-server-basics/sql-server-coalesce/
